label: Product
comment: A reference to a product or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trading purposes.

datatypeProperties.comment: A buyer assigned identifier of this product batch.
A unique industry assigned identifier for this product.
A manufacturer assigned identifier of this product batch.
A code specifying a type of relationship for this referenced product.
A seller assigned identifier of this product batch.

referencedBy.comment: A referenced accessory product applicable for this supply chain trade line item.
A referenced product additionally applicable with this supply chain trade line item.
A referenced complementary product applicable for this supply chain trade line item.
A referenced component product applicable for this supply chain trade line item.
An included product referenced from this trade product.
A required product applicable for this supply chain trade line item.
The referenced product specified for this subordinate trade line item.
A referenced substitute product applicable for this supply chain trade line item.
A referenced product that may substitute for this trade product.
A referenced product substituted for this supply chain trade line item.
